comment: Was using the default version of the app that came with the Pixel 7 Pro and in the edit window under suggestions it had options such as dynamic, color pop, vivid, luminous, radiant etc. Suddenly it changed and only has enhance, warm and cool. Why have these options disappeared? How do you get them back? Great app if I can get these features back otherwise it's very basic and buggy.
scenarios: Using the default version of the app that came with the Pixel 7 Pro, go to the edit window under suggestions and observe the options such as dynamic, color pop, vivid, luminous, radiant, etc.
Observe that the edit window under suggestions now only shows enhance, warm, and cool options.
Determine how to get the previously available options (dynamic, color pop, vivid, luminous, radiant, etc.) back.
key sentence: Using the default version of the app that came with the Pixel 7 Pro, go to the edit window under suggestions and observe the options such as dynamic, color pop, vivid, luminous, radiant, etc.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to navigate to library/memories/search, cast content, back up photos, favorite items, and access various editing and sharing options.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Navigate up', 'description': 'Move to the parent screen'}, {'name': 'Favorite', 'description': 'Mark the item as a favorite'}, {'name': 'More options', 'description': 'Access additional options'}, {'name': 'Cast', 'description': 'Cast the photo.'}, {'name': 'Share', 'description': 'Share the item with others'}, {'name': 'Edit', 'description': 'Edit the item'}, {'name': 'Lens', 'description': 'Open the lens feature'}, {'name': 'Delete', 'description': 'Delete the item'}]
